div.p: This research was supported by the Research Council of Norway grant 229819 (C.C., S.D.S.). B.R. acknowledges support from RCN grant 221712. We like to thank S. Belt (Biogeochemistry Research Centre, University of Plymouth, UK) for providing the 7-HND standard for IP 25 quantification. We thank W. Luttmer for lab assistance, and A. Wuelbers and W. Hale at the IODP Bremen Core Repository for their help during sampling.
